entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Showers beginning early this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023
